title: West Pakistan and Control of Loudspeakers sound Amplifiers, 1965
title_en: West Pakistan and Control of Loudspeakers sound Amplifiers, 1965
description: Official consolidated text of West Pakistan and Control of Loudspeakers sound Amplifiers, 1965 (II of 1965) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 7. Confiscation. A Court trying an offence under this Ordinance may order the confiscation
provisions.content:
of any loudspeaker or sound amplifier or apparatus used in the commission of an offence under this
Ordinance.

provisions.title: Section 8. Repeal. The West Pakistan Regulation of Loudspeakers and Sound Amplifiers Ordinance
provisions.content:
1964 (W.P. Ord. XIII of 1964) is hereby repealed.
_____________
